DOC.brief_summary: Ischemia/reperfusion ( I/R ) -induced acute kidney injury serious complication affect patient outcome follow cardiovascular surgery . Propofol , intravenously administer anesthetic antioxidant property , protects organs I/R injury . This study aim investigate ability propofol protect kidney I/R injury patient undergo valvular heart surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Propofol Renal Injury Patients Undergoing Valvular Heart Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo valvular heart surgery . Age : 20~75 . Emergency operation . Patients vitamin E vitamin C within 5 day surgery . Patients preoperative Creactive protein ( CRP ) > 16 mg/L . Patients serum creatinine â‰¥ 2.0 mg/dL Patients hemodialysis . Patients acute myocardial infarction within 1 week surgery
